Generation - Class in Unnamed Package
This is the class for the Generation object
Generation(boolean...) - Constructor for class Generation
Generates status array from specified boolean states
Generation(String, char) - Constructor for class Generation
Generates status array from specified string with defined symbol to represent true
getCurrentGeneration() - Method in class Automaton
This method gets and returns the current method
getGeneration(int) - Method in class Automaton
This method gets the Generation that was evolved at a certain step number in the Automaton
getNeighborhood(int, Generation) - Method in class ElementaryRule
This method returns a boolean array with the state of the index specified and the neighbors to a radius one on the left and right
getNeighborhood(int, Generation) - Method in class Rule
This is an abstract method to get the neighborhood states to an index
getNeighborhood(int, Generation) - Method in class TotalisticRule
Gets the neighborhood states of an index to radius of 2 states to the left and right
getNeighborhoodByRadius(int, int, Generation) - Static method in class Rule
Gets the neighborhood of a given index in the generation with a given radius e.g index of radius one [cellStates[idx-1], cellStates[idx], cellStates[idx+1]]

getStates(char, char) - Method in class Generation
